|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ4019; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 716 <!-- 716 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = Parallel SLC NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 1 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;W25Q256JVEQ; |flash2size = 32 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Winbond;W634GU6MB-12; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm;QCA8075;Qualcomm, QCA8075C; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = C4:93:00 |oui = C4:93:00
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;4.14.113;OpenWrt r9932-13962b7;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, USB 3.0, eMMC module socket, microSD |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12-24 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/11/2020 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = EU
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->

===Models=== :;[https://www.8devices.com/wiki/ Products] :<u>''Single band''</u> *[[8devices Carambola 2]] • [[Atheros]] AR9331, 16MB/64MB, 1T1R *[[8devices Centipede]] • [[Atheros]] AR9331, 16MB/64MB, 1T1R *[[8devices Kinkan]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8197FS, 32MB/128MB, 2T2R *[[8devices Lima]] • [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA4531, 32MB/64MB, 2T2R :<u>''Dual-band''</u> *[[8devices Habanero]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019, 32MB/512MB, 2T2R, Wave2 *[[8devices Jalapeno]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4018, 128MB/256MB, 2T2R, Wave2 *[[8devices Komikan]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8197FS/RTL8822BEH, 32MB/128MB, 2T2R, BT 4.1 *[[8devices Mango]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ6010/QCN5121/QCN5152, 32MB/512MB, 2T2R, Wi-Fi 6 *[[8devices Rambutan]] • [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9557/QCA9550, 128MB/128MB, 2T2R :<u>''Radio modules''</u> *[[8devices BLACK bean]] • [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9377, 1T1R, BT, USB *[[8devices BLUE bean]] • [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9377, 1T1R, BT, USB *[[8devices RED bean]] • [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9377, 1T1R, SDIO 3.0, UART
